title: Max Family Health Gold

covers.description: Covers in-patient expenses during hospitalization including room rent, doctor’s fees, etc.
Covers medical expenses 30 days before and 60 days after hospitalization.
Covers expenses for short procedures that do not require 24-hour hospitalization.

exclusion: Cosmetic surgery, dental treatment, self-inflicted injuries

title: Senior Health Plus

covers.description: Lump sum benefit on diagnosis of critical illnesses like cancer, heart attack, etc.
Cashless hospitalization at partner network hospitals.

exclusion: Non-allopathic treatment, HIV/AIDS, congenital diseases, obesity surgery

title: Basic Health Secure

covers.description: Covers costs arising from accidents requiring emergency care and treatment.
Reimbursement of ambulance transportation charges up to the limit.

exclusion: Pregnancy, OPD expenses, injuries due to adventure sports

covers.description: Lump sum benefit on diagnosis of critical illnesses like cancer, heart attack, etc.
Cashless hospitalization at partner network hospitals.

title: Care Secure Silver Plus

covers.description: Covers up to a set room rent during hospitalization.
Covers 60 days before and 90 days after hospital stay.
Ambulance expenses for patient transfer up to insured amount.

exclusion: Infertility treatment, dental procedures, cosmetic procedures

covers.description: Covers expenses for both minor and major surgeries.
Includes 50+ day-care procedures without 24-hour stay.
Treatment at home when hospital bed not available.

title: Wellness Family Protect

covers.description: Lump-sum benefit on detection of serious illnesses.
Daily benefit for hospital stay beyond 24 hours.
Covers expenses for organ donor procedures.

exclusion: Pre-existing diseases for 2 years, dental, weight control treatments

title: MediAssist Comfort Plan

covers.description: All in-patient hospitalization costs including medication.
Covers medical care for newborns up to 3 months.
Covers vaccinations in the first year after birth.

exclusion: OPD expenses, vision correction, experimental treatments

title: Platinum Plus Mediclaim

covers.description: Coverage after 2-year waiting period.
ICU room rent and nursing expenses included.
Ayush and other non-allopathic treatments.

exclusion: Cosmetic treatments, self-inflicted injuries, war injuries

title: Family First Secure

covers.description: Expenses for delivery and related complications.
Vaccination charges for first child up to 2 years.
Health check-ups for family members each year.

exclusion: Sexually transmitted diseases, infertility treatments, dental care

covers.description: Covers select OPD treatments for listed ailments.
Consultation expenses for second opinion.
Covers pharmacy bills up to the sum insured.

title: LifeGuard Ultra Value

covers.description: Covers in-patient care and ICU during COVID-19.
Specific cancer-related treatment coverage.
Compensation for accidental disability.

exclusion: Genetic illness, elective surgeries, dental care

covers.description: Insures regular dialysis as an outpatient.
Cash benefit for day-care admissions.
Increased coverage for each claim-free year.

title: Fortune Health Advantage

covers.description: Hospitalization expenses incurred outside India.
Covers psychiatric evaluation and treatment.
Advanced annual health checkups for adults.

exclusion: Obesity, drug abuse, self-harm related treatment
